log_out.title: Log out
log_out.desc: Are you sure you want to log out?

side.please_login: To view and post comments, please {login}.
side.please_relogin: The token has expired. Please {login} again.

login_note.title: To login, you agree to YouTube's {terms} and {privacy}. See {document} for API and data usage.

menu.hide_username: Do not display the user name

display.title: Display settings
display.note: * You can expand the original text by clicking.

menu.add: Add a livestream from clipboard (Alt + V)

videos.get-link: Open the livestream in a new tab

post.not_found: Please select the live stream you want to comment on first.
post.error: Error: Failed to post a comment.

introduction.title: What is this?: A tool for viewing comments from multiple live streams.
introduction.body: After logging in, let's add a livestream!: Copy the YouTube Live's URL, press â–½ at the top to open the menu, and click "{add}".

index.error_url: Parse error: It doesn't seem to be the youtube URL.
index.error_already: This URL has already been added.
index.paste_url: Please paste YouTube Live's URL: (your browser does not support clipboard API)

errors.default: Error: An error occurred while retrieving data. There seems to be a problem with the YouTube API or the video id.
errors.no_livestream: Error: This is not the URL of a livestream, or an ending livestream has been detected.
